title: Interaction Strategies to Address Expectation Gaps in Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: University-Level Basic Learning Strategies and Smartphone Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling for working adult learners, emphasizing smartphone-based activities.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers using three or more interaction tools (comments, real-time polls, discussion boards) in remote environments
Learners can participate in asynchronous discussion activities at least twice weekly to analyze learning content and provide feedback
Learners can create a self-directed learning plan and achieve a weekly goal completion rate of 70% or higher
Learners can maintain a sense of belonging through community activities in digital platforms and share problem-solving experiences leveraging collective intelligence

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
